title: McConnell's calculus: Paul Kane & Carrie Dann on the next steps, plus Chuck looks to the Biden administration
description: Washington Post Senior Congressional correspondent Paul Kane joins Carrie Dann to talk about the politics of impeachment. Chuck and Carrie discuss the Biden team's plans for the first six months.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
